Class Box.BoxDescriptor

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.appinventor.client.widgets.boxes.Box.BoxDescriptor
  • Enclosing class:
    Box

    public static final class Box.BoxDescriptor
extends Object
    Describes a box in the context of a layout.

                 int width,

        Creates a new box description.
        Parameters:
        type - type of box
        width - width of box in pixels
        height - height of box in pixels if not minimized
        minimized - indicates whether box is minimized
